Package problem

Class SpacePatrols

java.lang.Object
problem.AbstractIntegerSingleMatrixProblem<IntegerMatrix>
problem.SpacePatrols
All Implemented Interfaces:
Problem<IntegerMatrix>, SingleMatrixProblem<IntegerMatrix,IntegerMatrix>
public class SpacePatrols extends AbstractIntegerSingleMatrixProblem<IntegerMatrix>
This class represents the Space Patrols problem.

This problem is defined by an integer matrix, and its solution is an integer vector.

See Also:
